name: THE TRIUMVIRATE
description: English has its moments in the sun and this work showcases just how wild this language is. These 3 words are forever linked to each other, whether I make this artwork or not. This is the kind of weird quantum foam I keep referring to every now and then. As Einstein famously referred to the concept of quantum entanglement, "spooky action from a distance". In many abstract ways, English is similar, but obviously way different. No matter what happened in the past, or what is happening now, and/or way in the distant future...these three words will forever hold a bond. I eagerly look for words like this. You don't come across them quite often, but when you do you know you have something quite special. To find a triumvirate like this we need to think about words that can be used as a prefix and/or a suffix of a word; not an easy task. Hopefully, I'll be able to triangulate (see what I did there?) some more and and showcase them.
